amendment.description: Amendment removes the requirement that toll rates on high occupancy toll lanes be differentiated for low income drivers.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 109-15 to remove the requirement that toll rates on high occupancy toll lanes be differentiated for low income drivers.

action.text: Amendment (A011) offered by Mr. Davis, Tom.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Davis, Tom amendment (A011) Agreed to by recorded vote: 224 - 201 (Roll no. 62).
